title: Streaming Pipeline
description:
StreamingPipelineSpec defines the desired state of StreamingPipeline.
It orchestrates the complete video processing workflow by referencing transcoding,
packaging, encryption, thumbnail, and output profiles. The pipeline serves as a
reusable configuration template for StreamingJobs, defining how input media should
be processed, packaged, and delivered.

encryptionProfileRef.description:
EncryptionProfileRef references an EncryptionProfile resource for DRM and content protection.
When specified, transcoded outputs will be encrypted using the configured encryption
scheme (e.g., AES-128, CENC, CBCS) to protect content from unauthorized access.
Encryption is applied during or after transcoding before packaging.

mode.description:
Mode specifies the streaming delivery mode (live, event, or vod).
This determines the playlist/manifest behavior and segment availability:
- live: Real-time streaming with rolling segment window
- event: Growing manifest during the event, finalized after completion
- vod: Static manifest with all segments available immediately
The mode affects how the PackagingProfile generates and updates manifests.

notificationProfileRef.description:
NotificationProfileRef references a NotificationProfile resource for job event notifications.
When specified, the system sends notifications (webhooks, emails, SNS, etc.) about
job lifecycle events such as started, completed, failed, or progress updates.
Acts as the default notification configuration for StreamingJobs using this pipeline.
Individual jobs can override this profile.

outputDestinationRef.description:
OutputDestinationRef references a secret for csi-driver-rclone that specifies
the storage destination for processed media files.
Supports various storage backends (S3, GCS, Azure Blob, HTTP, etc.).
See: https://github.com/veloxpack/csi-driver-rclone/
This defines where transcoded videos, manifests, segments, and auxiliary files are uploaded.
Acts as the default output location for StreamingJobs using this pipeline.
Individual jobs can override this destination.

packagingProfileRef.description:
PackagingProfileRef references a PackagingProfile resource that defines streaming manifest and segmentation settings.
The PackagingProfile specifies the streaming mode (live/vod/event), manifest formats (DASH/HLS),
segment duration, and protocol-specific parameters for delivering the transcoded media to players.

scrubPreviewProfileRef.description:
ScrubPreviewProfileRef references a ScrubPreviewProfile resource for WebVTT sprite sheet generation.
When specified, creates sprite sheets combining multiple thumbnails into single images
with accompanying WebVTT files, enabling efficient trick play, timeline previews, and seek scrubbing.
Sprites are generated after thumbnail extraction.

thumbnailProfileRef.description:
ThumbnailProfileRef references a ThumbnailProfile resource for thumbnail image generation.
When specified, thumbnail images are extracted from the video at configured intervals,
suitable for preview galleries, video catalogs, and poster frames.
Thumbnails are generated during transcoding.

transcodingProfileRef.description:
TranscodingProfileRef references a TranscodingProfile resource that defines video and audio transcoding settings.
The TranscodingProfile specifies codecs, resolutions, bitrates, and audio layouts for converting
the input media into multiple output renditions suitable for adaptive bitrate streaming.
